definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
a dad (father of a young child)
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel

sentences.english: Patty minded his ridiculing less when her mother was the butt of it.
sentences.chinese: 如果她爸的嘲笑对象是她妈，帕蒂就不怎么介意了。

sentences.english: It was the first year my dad bought season tickets to the Clips.
sentences.chinese: 这是我爸第一次买快船的季票。

sentences.english: What are you getting your dad for Father's Day?
sentences.chinese: 你在父亲节要送你爸什么？

sentences.english: Dad always stuck up for you, you should do the same for him.
sentences.chinese: 爸总是“护”着你，你应该知恩图报。

sentences.english: Oh, dad, your stew makes my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 噢，爸，你炖得菜香得让我流口水了。

sentences.english: Patty bowed her head and asked what her father thought she should do.
sentences.chinese: 帕蒂低下了头，问她爸，他认为自己该怎么做。

sentences.english: I stood on the barriers in the Kippax and held my dad's neck.
sentences.chinese: 我站在桅杆外面，抱着我爸的脖子。

sentences.english: Remember, your Pa's your Pa no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 你得记住，不管咋样你爸就是你爸。

sentences.english: Remember, your Pa's your Pa no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 你得记住，不管咋样你爸就是你爸。

sentences.english: You've had at least one hair cut from your mom or dad.
sentences.chinese: 你爸或者你妈从没给你理过发。

sentences.english: W: I’d love to, but it’s my turn this month to help my dad at the shop .
sentences.chinese: 我倒是想去，只是这个月轮到我在商店帮我爸。

sentences.english: At that moment, dad was shocked. He tried to say something but didn't.
sentences.chinese: 在那一刻爸惊呆了，他想要说些什么，但最终没有说。

sentences.english: We'd had arguments about it. My dad and I.
sentences.chinese: 我和我爸曾为这事争吵过。

sentences.english: He was in my father’s class 59.
sentences.chinese: 他和我爸是59级同班同学。
